description:
11.193 pixelize
Apply pixelization to video stream.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: pixelize

parameters.description: Set block dimensions that will be used for pixelization. Default value is 16.
parameters.name: width, w

parameters.description: Set block dimensions that will be used for pixelization. Default value is 16.
parameters.name: height, h

parameters.description:
Set the mode of pixelization used.

Possible values are:

‘avg’
‘min’
‘max’

Default value is avg.
parameters.name: mode, m

parameters.description: Set what planes to filter. Default is to filter all planes.
parameters.name: planes, p

source:
11.193 pixelize

Apply pixelization to video stream.

The filter accepts the following options:

width, w
height, h

Set block dimensions that will be used for pixelization. Default value is 16.

mode, m

Set the mode of pixelization used.

Possible values are:

‘avg’
‘min’
‘max’

Default value is avg.

planes, p

Set what planes to filter. Default is to filter all planes.
